text: Unham de rasulam ne akhi'a ki alaha de sabadha vica saka hai jihara akasam ate dharati nu asali'ata vica li'a'una vala hai. Uha tuhanu bula riha hai ki tuhade papa mu'afa kara deve. Ate tuhanu ika niradharita same taka khul'ha deve. Unham ne kiha ki tusim isa tom binam kujha nahim ki sade varage ika manukha ho. Tusim cahude ho ki sanu unham cizam di puja tom roka devom jinham di puja sade vadere karade sana. Tusim sade sahamane ko'i sapasata pramana lai a'u
